attributes.title: Crusty Cheeto Back At It Again 😤
attributes.review: So I had decided to download this app to be a good American and Support my orange non homophobic cultural loving president🥰. But little did i know that was a bad idea. So it was around 4:45 pm when i downloaded this and then it asked me for my information (which i found kinda personal). But I thought nothing of the such after i thought about our loving Cheeto Puff. After I put my information in i started getting all these text asking for toe and hair line pics. I found that extremely weird of the such and kept saying wrong number and blocking them 😌. But after a few days passed by i then got an email by an unknown sender, and so I clicked on it. but when I clicked on it it asked me for toe nail clippings🤔. I found that really weird and then I decided to chill and watch some Netflix. But I kept seeing these figures over and over again, I thought it was just my imagination. But then I swear I heard something whisper behind my ear saying “are you lost baby gorl”. At that moment I started freaking out and looked around shaking. But I then went to the kitchen to make me some pizza rolls, after I heated them up I went back to my room and heard something in my closet. so I went and opened it and saw the teletubies in a circle saying “ooga shacka” repeatedly over a doll that looked like me. So I ran and got my phone and deleted the app and then boom they disappeared and I haven’t seen them since 😶. So I figure they were some of the Cheetos puff minions coming to get me 🤬
